page.title: 05Lovelady Shield, Alston Moor
page.content: Lovelady Shield is a country house {hotel}and is situated two and a half miles from Alston in a secluded position by the{River Nent.} The house was built in l830 and was converted into a hotel a few years ago. The building is of{sandstone and limestone and is set in a large garden with tennis court and croquet lawn. It has twelve bedrooms, each with private facilities. Lovelady Shield attracts {visitors}from many different places. This year, apart from the British and parties of visitors staying during the grouse season, they have had people from{America, Holland, Belgium and {Scandinavia.} The owner gets his wine direct from France and his wife is responsible for the English and French cooking on the menu.
